sentences.en: He had a cringing manner but a very harsh voice.
sentences.cn: 他有卑屈谄媚的神情,但是声音却十分粗沙.

sentences.en: Hsin - mei stared wide - eyed at the cringing Kao Suns - nien and with a " Humph " turned and departed.
sentences.cn: 辛楣 睁大眼,望一望瑟缩的高松年, “ 哼 ” 一声,转身就走.
皮平: ( 哭失声 ) 多尔夫, 原谅我.

sentences.en: She even disgraces the name of Linton; and I've sometimes relented, from pure lack of invention, in my experiments on what she could endure, and still creep shamefully cringing back!
sentences.cn: 她甚至都玷辱了林惇的名声，我试验她能忍受的能力，而她总还是含羞地谄媚地爬回来，由于实在想不出新的办法，我有时候都动了慈悲心肠哩！

sentences.en: She's always cringing to the boss.
sentences.cn: 她在上司面前总是卑躬屈膝.

sentences.en: So your enemies shall come cringing to you, And you shall tread upon their high places.
sentences.cn: 你的仇敌必投降你; 你必踏在他们的高处.

sentences.en: Their servile lives were spent in grovelling and cringing and toiling and running about like little dogs at the behest of their numerous masters.
sentences.cn: 他们卑躬屈节的一生是在拍马奉承、拼命干活中度过的，他们象小狗般的奔走在无数主人膝下。

trans.tran_cn: 畏缩( cringe的现在分词)，退缩，卑躬屈，憎恶
